website_summaries.verdict: This compact UV flashlight is an affordable but powerful choice at a mid-range price point.
pros: Detects urine stains not visible to the human eye
Uses 21 UV LEDs for maximum illumination
Company also makes urine stain remover solution and deodorizer
cons: Urine stains can be difficult to distinguish, especially on hardwood flooring and carpets

customer_reviews.title: This little gadget actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this at a pet store for twice the price. I decided to look on Amazon and saw the price was so much better and I immediately purchased it. it actually works so well it's scary to see all the pee from the cats and dogs that you never knew were even there. It definitely works! I would recommend this two people that want to know where the pee stains are.
customer_reviews.author: ANABELLE

customer_reviews.title: It highlights all the stains!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Doesn't need to be pitch black to see stains, but the room needs to be dark. Doesn't highlight wet urine, but I didn't expect it to. Also highlighted areas where I have cleaned and carpent cleaned but didn't clean throughly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Humble

customer_reviews.title: Present won’t work people didn’t tell me not wanting to embarrass me. Plenty embarrassed now.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as part of a gift. I just found out it never worked. I purchased energizer batteries hoping it would help but this is a defective product. I’m embarrassed! I want a new one to replace this one. It’s obvious it was never used since it doesn’t work. Please SEND one that works and you can have this one back to see what’s wrong.
customer_reviews.author: alamb

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work at all. I used it on my rug where my dog has had an accident before. It didn't show up at all and all over the rug showed tony pieces of lint lit up in many different colors. There's no way that's all the tiniest drops of pee, so what is it showing? Who knows, but it doesn't help identify the boundaries of a pee stain.
customer_reviews.author: FeedbackfromCali

customer_reviews.title: Totally effective...as a pee marking detective
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little light for detecting pee spots. I've practically been able to stop repeat spraying by finding the spots and neutralizing the odor...FYI..Natures Miracle No More Spraying just for cats works!!
customer_reviews.author: DianaB

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy workmanship
customer_reviews.text: The first light I received had a VERY frustrating series of shorts. Actually fixed a few before we gave up and returned. First Amazon product I ever returned. (If you think you have battery problems, it might actually be this!). The replacement is working fine (after five hours).
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't really sure what outcome I was gonna get using this..veey impressed with this light. It has shown way more than I expected. It even shows how well I have cleaned urine prior to getting the light. It also shows areas that need to be cleaned from other spills etc. Thanks for this wonderful product! I will now being spending my weekend cleaning with it by my side!
customer_reviews.author: jonathan melvin

customer_reviews.title: Fantistic
customer_reviews.text: This light actually works which makes it great. I was skeptical at first but this lil' light does show the PP which that lil pup errs. I highly recommend it for training purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. I use it on all my polymer clay resin projects. Works beautifully!!! The driver was very friendly and warm. Thanks, Diana
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Finds the urine day or nite.
customer_reviews.text: Between my neighbor and I we have three older cats. Sometimes one of them doesn't make it to the litter box or punishes us for leaving them. We share the urine spotter. Now after treating the spots we have pleasant smelling homes.
customer_reviews.author: C jr

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: It really works! The light is very strong and the size is great very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Vro R. Ospina

customer_reviews.title: Detects pet urine very clearly!
customer_reviews.text: Actually detects pet urine! A previous light by another company did not, so I was happy (and disgusted) to see this one work!
customer_reviews.author: ArtsBasedLife

customer_reviews.title: This works much better than the fluorescent tube of their earlier model that ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprise! This works much better than the fluorescent tube of their earlier model that required the room to be very dark.
customer_reviews.author: Blu

customer_reviews.title: For truth-seekers only
customer_reviews.text: Ever since my neighbor's (huge, aggressive, male) cat came through our cat door for a romp around our house, MY (tiny, timid, male) cat has taken to marking all the walls and carpets. This blacklight has been very helpful in spotting his.. messages. Now we know that we will HAVE to buy new carpets. No more denial.
customer_reviews.author: G. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, included batteries are not.
customer_reviews.text: Losing one star for the fact that the batteries it comes with are very very low. When I first turned it on I was concerned that the light was too dim and nothing showed up unless you were 6 inches away. I then popped in 3 energizer AAA's and Wow, it was like turning on a spotlight. A very very scary spotlight. Buy this and get your cleaning supplies ready.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Selph

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk
customer_reviews.text: The battery housing was completely wired wrong. One of the battery spots didn’t have a spring at all and the other had two springs... I’ll be requesting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: yes, it's sure does work and is easy to use...now to find something that not only gets rid of the smell to our noses but to theirs which are much stronger. we need a strong cleaner so they won't keep remarking territory
customer_reviews.author: T. Getler

customer_reviews.title: Find the spots you smell but don't see
customer_reviews.text: A must have for new puppy owners. Find the spots you can smell but can't see.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy and works for what it is advertised for.
customer_reviews.author: R. Youkey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for making sure accidents are completely cleaned. Fast shipping and good buying experience. Would recommend this product to anyone with a kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Beartracks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You can easily see where the urine is with this Urine Detector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well, I could see where my cat had peed
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette E. Pigott

customer_reviews.title: Simple Solution Spot Spotter HD UV Urine Detector
customer_reviews.text: This UV detector works. I was able to find where my cat was marking by using this. I would recommend this to anyone who has pets that have "accidents"
customer_reviews.author: Danae

customer_reviews.title: With three little boys in the household, this is ...
customer_reviews.text: With three little boys in the household, this is is a godsend to spot trouble areas when cleaning the bathrooms!
customer_reviews.author: akamel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: The light only lasted for one use before giving out completely. I tried replacing the batteries, but no luck. Definitely a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: HV2010

customer_reviews.title: Love it...but hate seeing what it found.
customer_reviews.text: Love it...but hate seeing what it found. This is the tool that convinced us to put a gate on a basement stairs so the dogs can't get on any carpet.
customer_reviews.author: IronDogs

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: waste of money. does not work as advertised. as in, you can not spot any urine, at all.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This really works and easy to use. I found my dog's secret hiding places.
customer_reviews.author: Mys Tique

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome way to find pet urine. I highly recommend it,
customer_reviews.author: Teri L. Sowby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not identify any urine spots, even those I already knew existed.
customer_reviews.author: RalphG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very useful and easy to use. May tell you more than you want to know.
customer_reviews.author: Everett C. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store with wide range
customer_reviews.text: It's small & compact. Easy to store with wide range.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: I use them to spot seam sealer in carpet seams ...
customer_reviews.text: I use them to spot seam sealer in carpet seams. one of the units does not work. I need to send that one back
customer_reviews.author: James Pukas

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This light works well. The price is good and the product is built to last. The light does highlight stains other than urine (like stains from rain damage), so be prepared for that.
customer_reviews.author: Toast

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Did not differentiate clean vs. soiled surfaces on rugs or hard wood floors. I do not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: mystery solved
customer_reviews.text: This product help me find the source of the problem. It is easy to use & it saved the day!
customer_reviews.author: marilyn halpern

customer_reviews.title: Battery Operation Is A Must
customer_reviews.text: You can simply buy a under the cabinet fluorescent light with a standard Black Light Bulb and make your own Urine Detector for cheap but this means you can only check near outlets. This works like a flashlight so you can look at all those spots you don't have power outlet to reach which is why I bought it. Good item, wish it was bigger and brighter but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: doesitreallymatter873

customer_reviews.title: It was not useful for me
customer_reviews.text: After I detected and cleaned the pet urine, the light still detects the pet urine and I can not know if the pets make their business in the same spot again. It was not useful for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chio Flores

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased with it for urine stains
customer_reviews.text: Did not clean urine. Spot is still yellow and I followed the directions perfectly. Not pleased with it for urine stains.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kelley

customer_reviews.title: 3 AAA's in 24 Hrs.
customer_reviews.text: The batteries (3 AAA's) on the unit I received only lasted 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jørgensen

product_meta.title: Simple Solution UV Pet Urine Detector | Spot and Eliminate Dog and Cat Urine Stains | 21 UV LED Lights Reveal Stains for Targeted Cleanup
product_meta.description: Simple Solution Spot Spotter HD UV Pet Urine Detector use ultraviolet light to reveal hidden dog and cat urine stains on your carpet, bedding, or furniture, so you can remove the odor at its source. Using 21 powerful ultraviolet LEDs, the Spot Spotter makes urine stains glow in the dark, and reveals hidden urine stains that are undetectable to the human eye! Directions: Twist off the bottom cap and install three AAA batteries (included). Turn the unit on and shine it on the carpet or other surface. For best results, the room should be as dark as possible. Pet urine will glow under the Spot Spotter HD light, revealing the source of the odor.
feature_bullets: Simple Solution Spot Spotter HD UV Pet Urine Detector uses ultraviolet light to reveal dog and cat urine stains on your carpet, bedding, or furniture
Using 21 powerful ultraviolet LEDs, the Spot Spotter makes urine stains glow in the dark, revealing hidden urine stains
Spot and eliminate dog and cat urine stains at their source that are undetectable to the human eye
Use in conjunction with Simple Solution Stain + Odor remover to completely eliminate all traces of urine stain and odor
Requires three (3) AAA batteries (included with package)
